failure.message:
Resource: kind=Deployment/name=frontend
Test: Label usage for resources Remediation: Define labels that are most suitable to your needs of use the exceptions to prevent further notifications. Link for more details: https://hub.armosec.io/docs/c-0076 Available fix: - metadata.labels=YOUR_VALUE Test: Ingress and Egress blocked Remediation: Define a network policy that restricts ingress and egress connections. Link for more details: https://hub.armosec.io/docs/c-0030 Test: K8s common labels usage Remediation: Define applicable labels or use the exception mechanism to prevent further notifications. Link for more details: https://hub.armosec.io/docs/c-0077 Available fix: - metadata.labels=YOUR_VALUE - spec.template.metadata.labels=YOUR_VALUE Test: Forbidden Container Registries Remediation: Limit the registries from which you pull container images from Link for more details: https://hub.armosec.io/docs/c-0001 Failed paths: - spec.template.spec.containers[0].image Test: Images from allowed registry Remediation: You should enable all trusted repositories in the parameters of this control. Link for more details: https://hub.armosec.io/docs/c-0078 Failed paths: - spec.template.spec.containers[0].image
